 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַט‎</span>] **verb** ==incise, scratch== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְרַט‎</span> Pa ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[1Sam.21.14|1Sam 21:14]]), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***scratch***, hence ***write*** (= <span class="bdbLangGreek">χαράσσω</span>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šarâ‰u***</u></abbr>, ***slit up, rend***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slit*** ear of camel, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sign, mark*** ([[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 214 f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבִבְשָׂרָם לֹא יִשְׂרְטוּ שָׂרָ֑טֶת‎</span> [[Lev.21.5|Lev 21:5]] ***shall make no incision; Infinitive absolute*** with **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרוֺט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׂרֵ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Zech.12.3|Zech 12:3]] those loaded with the stone ***shall be severely scratched***, lacerated.
